name: UP904545 - Memeroids
description:
This Asteroids game was made with help from a Youtube Tutorial from Eric Gallery at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDNjffnb6ftCyWWNeUdTRsg

Memeroids is a short little project with a twist, instead of shooting asteroids you shoot famous icons such as Thanos, Iron Man, Ali-A and even the Moth.

p.s. dont hit the secret button
